==Trivia==
* Watching the musicians perform for a while grants the {{Achievement|Whisper of the Heart}}.
===Etymology===
* ''{{w|Colonche}} is a fermented liquor of pre-Hispanic origin. It is typical of Bajio, a north-central region of Mexico; and is prepared with ''tuna'', the fruit of the ''{{w|nopal}}'' cactus.
